document_name: Executive Decree No. 304/14 approving the Regulation of the Cabinet of the National Directorate of Rural Electrification
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/AGO/2014/AGO-2014-03-10-Executive Decree No. 304_14 approving the Regulation of the Cabinet of the National Directorate of Rural Electrification_11aadebb51bd391489e3f834922533a3.pdf
document_description: This Executive Decree approves the Regulation of the Cabinet of the National Directorate of Rural Electrification. This Regulation, consisting of six Chapters and 1 Annex, establishes composition, duties and responsibilities of the above mentioned institution, entitled to: coordinate and streamline the country's electrification process, setting out its tasks and regulating its organisational structure in general. Part of its duties is to promote renewable energies for rural areas.
